content.title: Counter-Strike
content.description: Dedicated Counter-Strike player with a focus on competitive gameplay and team strategies. Always striving to improve game sense and team coordination.

content.title: Solo Gaming
content.description: Big fan of solo video games since childhood, exploring immersive worlds and captivating stories. From epic RPGs to narrative adventure games, every gaming experience is a new adventure.

content.title: Cinema Enthusiast
content.description: Enthusiast of all genres of cinema, from classic films to modern masterpieces. Particularly interested in storytelling techniques and cinematography.

content.title: TV Series & Animation
content.description: Following the golden age of television with keen interest in both mainstream and independent productions.

content.title: Digital Art & Design
content.description: Proficient in Photoshop and digital design tools, creating various types of content from social media assets to digital artworks. Constantly exploring new techniques and styles.

content.title: Streaming & Video Production
content.description: Experienced with OBS and video production tools, creating engaging content for various platforms. Focused on production quality and audience engagement.

content.title: Cambridge Diplomas
content.description: During my middle school years, I had the opportunity to take the Cambridge exams (PET & KEY).

content.title: BIA (Aeronautical Initiation Certificate)
content.description: Theoretical and practical training on aircraft, principles of flight, and navigation. Obtained the BIA in 2024.
